headline: Advanced Drainage (WMS) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Water management company Advanced Drainage Systems (NYSE:WMS) will be reporting results tomorrow before market hours. Here’s what to expect.

headline: Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) Stock Jumps 16% Over The Past Month
summary: Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) recently reported its Q1 2025 earnings, showcasing increased sales despite a dip in net income. Their commitment to shareholder value is emphasized through the ongoing dividend distribution and substantial expansion of their buyback program. Over the past month, Ingersoll Rand's stock price rose 16%, outperforming the broader market's 4% increase. The company's strategic moves in capital allocation, especially the increased buyback authorization, likely added weight...
